shareSection.mailSubject: Recommendation: Real Estate – HE immologis in Weinheim / Holger Eberhard
shareSection.mailBody:
Hello,

I would like to point you to Holger Eberhard and HE immologis UG (haftungsbeschränkt) i. Gr. Further information can be found at: {{url}}

For any questions or requests, Holger Eberhard is personally available in Weinheim:
+49 176 321 98 462
eberhard@he-immologis.de

If anyone in the Weinheim region is looking for support with property matters, this could be a helpful contact.

Best regards

cards.title: Logistics Consulting
cards.description: Reliable handling and advice. Transport solutions from a single source.

logistikberatung.introText: As a strategic experienced logistics consultant in Germany, I support companies in building and optimizing Europe-wide transport, warehouse and sales networks and Interim Sales Power – including non-temperature controlled goods and GDP-compliant temperature-controlled structures for pharmaceutical and healthcare logistics.
logistikberatung.eiswuerfelQuote: Just as an ice cube only remains stable under the right conditions, we create stable structures through training, strategy, network and interim solutions – in both temperature-controlled and non-temperature-controlled logistics scenarios.
logistikberatung.contactSubtitle: Would you like to learn more about a SMART module or arrange a non-binding conversation? Get in touch.
logistikberatung.contactSubtitleSlug: Get in touch – we look forward to hearing from you.

ueberMich.metaDescription: Holger Eberhard – Your contact for real estate and logistics in Weinheim and the Bergstraße region. Personal, experienced, with local expertise.
ueberMich.heading: About me
ueberMich.family: Married to Anni, proud stepfather of Noah and officially tolerated flatmate of our miniature wire-haired dachshund Houdini.
ueberMich.weinheim: We have been living in the heart of Weinheim for many years. I know the streets, many of the people and some of the stories behind the properties here.
ueberMich.kapstadt: At the same time, Cape Town has become a second home for us. This connection between Weinheim and South Africa shapes the way I think and act:
ueberMich.sloganSub: For me that is not a slogan – it is lived reality.
ueberMich.career1: For many years I have been working internationally in sales and business development in the logistics sector. In major projects I have harmonised the collaboration of international sales teams, integrated logistically complex supply chains across all modes of transport, supported M&A acquisition processes and helped develop complex temperature-controlled supply chain solutions in Europe.
ueberMich.career2: This only works with structure, personal responsibility and economic viability.
ueberMich.career3: I bring these experiences to the regional real estate market today.
ueberMich.regionalPlaces: Weinheim, Heppenheim, Bensheim, Ladenburg, Viernheim, Laudenbach, Lampertheim – along the Bergstraße, the adjoining Odenwald and beyond.
ueberMich.kapstadt2: The same applies to Cape Town, our second home. Here I am involved in aid projects and life around Table Mountain, the Atlantic and the Indian Ocean.
ueberMich.kapstadtTip: If you would like tips and information on emigrating, living and property in Cape Town, I am also happy to help with an open heart.
ueberMich.attitude1: For me, property is more than objects. It stands for life decisions, transitions and new beginnings – few things reflect life so strongly.
ueberMich.attitude2: My aim is to develop economically viable solutions for you while always keeping your ideas, wishes and realistic possibilities in mind.
ueberMich.whyHe1: From my international logistics and consulting experience and my passion for regional real estate, my company name was born:
ueberMich.whyHe3: It connects two worlds that at first glance seem opposite: global structural expertise and regional trust.
ueberMich.whyHe4: Today I live and work at exactly this interface. I look forward to accompanying your story too.
ueberMich.companyLine: HE immologis UG (limited liability) i. G.
ueberMich.companySubline: Real estate and logistics consulting · Property valuation (TA)
ueberMich.contactSubtitle: Do you have questions or would you like to have a non-binding conversation? I look forward to hearing from you.

sections.headline: Exclusivity
paragraphs: With me, your property is not simply displayed in the shop window alongside many others. It is in the spotlight.
You receive personal, direct and committed support from the first conversation through to successful completion.
I deliberately take on only a limited number of mandates. This ensures your property gets the attention, care and exclusivity it deserves – and you get the support you can expect.
sections.extra: Few mandates. Highest level of care.

sections.headline: Flexible ways to get in touch.
paragraphs: You can rely on me to act flexibly and reliably whenever we arrange appointments. Punctuality and availability are a matter of course for me.
I am also reachable outside standard business hours – whether by phone, WhatsApp or in a way that suits you best.
sections.extra: When you need me: just there.

sections.headline: Flexibility
paragraphs: Flexibility is not a buzzword for me – it has always been my working principle.

Every property, every owner and every situation is different — so I don’t use standard processes, but tailored solutions. Appointments, marketing channels, viewing models and coordination are consistently aligned to your needs and market conditions.
I respond quickly, think ahead and adapt strategies when framework conditions change.
The result: flexible processes — with a clear goal and reliable structure.

zertifikate.heroSubline: Professionalism through continuous training. As a founder-led company, I place the highest value on solid expertise and legal compliance.
zertifikate.weiterbildungText: In accordance with § 34c (2a) GewO and § 15b MaBV, we regularly fulfil the statutory continuing education requirement of at least 20 hours within 3 years. This keeps us up to date with the latest legal practice and market developments for you.

tippgeber.metaTitle: Give a tip – Referral programme | HE immologis
tippgeber.metaDescription: Become a referrer and earn up to €5,000 commission. Know someone who wants to sell? HE immologis UG.
tippgeber.heroSubline: Become a referrer and benefit from your recommendation.
tippgeber.introQuestion: Do you know someone who wants to sell their property?
tippgeber.introText: Then simply pass on the lead – and secure an attractive referrer bonus. You don’t need to organise anything or be an agent. A good contact is enough – we take care of the rest.
howSteps: You tell us about a property that is not yet publicly listed.
We contact the owner and take over the full marketing.
If a sale is completed through our brokerage, you receive your commission.
tippgeber.premiumTitle: Your bonus depending on sale price
tippgeber.hinweisText: When a tip is given for a property that is not publicly offered, we secure an exclusive brokerage mandate, market and sell the property – and upon completion the referrer bonus is paid out.
tippgeber.afterCheck: After review you will receive a written referrer agreement. Upon successful completion we pay your bonus directly to you.

provision.paragraph1: For the sake of transparency, please note that in the event of an appointment, a brokerage commission of 3.57% of the notarized purchase price (incl. statutory VAT) will apply. Unless otherwise agreed, this commission is borne equally by buyer and seller. The commission claim arises once the broker has been commissioned and the purchase agreement has been notarized.

kauftipps.heading: Tips for Buying a Property
kauftipps.intro: Purchasing a property is a significant decision. With the right preparation, you can make informed and confident choices.
tipTitles: Review of Documents and Land Registry Entries
tipContents: We clarify your personal situation, budget and location preferences before starting the search. Our aim is to find a property that truly fits your life – in Weinheim, the Bergstraße and the Rhine-Neckar region.

Plan your finances early: equity, running costs, notary and land registry fees, and broker commission. Compare financing options and obtain a financing certificate so you can act quickly when you find the right property.

We continuously monitor the market in Weinheim and the Bergstraße region and will contact you when a property matches your criteria. You receive clear descriptions and can decide in peace whether to view it.

During viewings we check the condition of the property: structure, heating, electrics, moisture, defects and refurbishment needs. We recommend an independent surveyor if needed so you can assess the price and plan realistically.

Before buying, review the land register extract, floor plan, energy certificate, declaration of division (for condominiums) and owners’ meeting minutes. We help you spot discrepancies or encumbrances and understand the rights and obligations attached to the property.

Based on market comparison, condition and your finances we provide a realistic price recommendation. We negotiate with the seller or their agent and aim for fair terms and a transparent, timely conclusion.

The notarial purchase contract is the legally binding step. We prepare the documents with you and can accompany you to the notary. The notary explains the contract, certifies the transfer and initiates the land register entry.
At handover, keys are handed over, meter readings recorded and the condition documented. We coordinate between you and the seller and are available for any questions so that move-in runs smoothly.

We remain your contact after the purchase. For questions on utilities, insurance, tradespeople or future sales, you can turn to us as your long-term partner for property in Weinheim and the Bergstraße.

provision.paragraph1: In Baden-Württemberg and Hesse, the "commissioning principle" (Bestellerprinzip) applies to residential rentals. This means that the party who commissions the real estate agent bears the costs. The brokerage commission in these federal states may amount to a maximum of two net monthly rents plus 19% VAT for the services rendered by the agent.

noRentals.text: All our properties are currently rented. Get on our waiting list!
